PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-16132018-12-20TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (REMOTELY PILOTED AIRCRAFT SYSTEMS) in order to (1) move away from the case-by-case treatment of non-recreational Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems; and (2) reduce the risks to aviation safety and to people caused by the unsafe operation of Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0011 Publication Date: 2019-01-09
AttachmentsAttachment
